title: Strange Evil
description: On the banks of the magical mountain... was a land of flying Satyrs and human-like fairiesâ€”a battleground, where the two tribes of the Mountain fought for power. Brought here by her cousin, the Earthling Judith lived in the tranquillity of the fantasy world.But, as an Other-worldly being caught between warring peoples, Judith was destined to die... until she discovered the Evil driving her cousin's enemies to fight to regain their power, now and forever!
author: Jane Gaskell
